name: Dungeon Cube
description:
Dungeon Cube is a 2D single player shooter platformer with puzzles spread throughout a map that is covered in hostlie creatures. 

Help your character solve the puzzles to clear this turnabout and gloomy dungeon.

This game is a project made by two gamedesign - and two animationdesign - students in their second semester as their first big project.

Have fun playing and feel free to leave us some feedback! :D
